caption.p: Linear regression of lincRNA and PTG expression. The r 0 and p 0 represent the Pearson correlation coefficient and p value of each pair of lincRNA and PTG in 6 samples, respectively; The r and p represent verification in 9 samples. ( A) MSTRG.12010 vs IGF-2. ( B) MSTRG.2530 vs WDR5. ( C) MSTRG.24143 vs SESN3. ( D) MSTRG.21771 vs SRF. ( E) MSTRG.14875 vs UNKL.
